bike.description: Reynolds 520 double-butted chromoly main tubes, extended head tube with reinforced collars, double tapered cromo stays, custom laser cut disc dropouts with double eyelets

components.description: Carbon fiber unicrown with disc mount, aluminum steerer, low-rider carrier mounts, forged dropouts and single eyelet
Alex ID-19 double wall alloy rims with GSW sidewall, 32H, Shimano M475 6-bolt disc hubs with QR and 14g stainless steel spokes
Vittoria Randonneur with Double Shielding puncture protection and reflective sidewalls, 700 x 32c
Shimano Deore M591 SGS rear and Deore M590 bottom-pull front
Full alloy platform, toe clip attachable
Jamis flat bar, 6061 T-6 aluminum, 31.8 x 10JAMIS_DEGREE sweep x 580mm
NVO Components F-2 adjustable threadless system (ATS) 3D cold forged aluminum stem, 7JAMIS_DEGREE x 90mm (15"), 100mm (17-19"), 120mm (21-23"). ATS shim length 100mm
Anatomic double density kraton grip with end plug
Jamis alloy micro-adjust, 27.2 x 350mm alloy clamp with QR seatpin
Selle San Marco SPID Arrowhead with Syntex cover and carbon steel rails
